ygData.subject: Re: Melifluous Motion -- another use
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t have this song yet but I thought its primary utililty was an escape mechanism for the bard.  For example, you are in a fight in which you are likely to
ygData.messageBody:
I don't have this song yet but I thought its primary utililty was an escape
mechanism for the bard. For example, you are in a fight in which you are
likely to die. You know its time to start running but first you sing the MM
to teleport away from the creatures whacking you. This gives you a
headstart against the mob and allows you to start singing Selos and equip
your drum to assist your escape.

Can someone confirm if MM assists in escaping from mobs in the manner I
described? Also, if you are in a group, does it teleport everyone the same
distance and direction or is it completely random for everyone?

Galtin
Bard and Master Brewer of E'ci
